arts.ttl: “I have self-respect and pride” – Espanyol manager defends himself amid calls for sacking
arts.sum: There has been plenty of discontent surrounding Espanyol in the last few weeks, and some of that has been aimed at head coach Manolo Gonzalez. According to recent reports, the 45-year-old has been on the verge of being sacked, although Saturday’s 3-1 home win over Celta Vigo will keep him in the job for another […] The post “I have self-respect and pride” – Espanyol manager defends himself amid calls for sacking appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Espanyol star to miss Getafe clash through suspension
arts.sum: Espanyol have on Saturday been dealt a blow on the personnel front. This comes amid confirmation that defender Marash Kumbulla will be unavailable for selection in the club’s next outing,…

arts.ttl: Weekend acca predictions: Five teams to back across Europe
arts.sum: With Der Klassiker taking centre stage, there are some terrific matches to follow across Europe this weekend and Liam Flin has scoured the top divisions for a five-team acca covering Saturday and Sunday.

Espanyol, on a four-game losing streak in La Liga, faced an uphill task against a resurgent Celta side. Despite securing promotion back to La Liga through the Segunda Division playoffs, the Catalan te...
Joe Champion has provided a score prediction for all 10 matches taking place in LaLiga on Friday, Saturday, Sunday and Monday.
